snippet: Adelle Waldman’s debut novel, “The Love Affairs of Nathaniel P.,” scrutinizes the title character and the Brooklyn literary scene he inhabits with a patient, anthropological detachment.
abstract: Maria Russo reviews book The Love Affairs of Nathaniel P by Adelle Waldman.
lead_paragraph: Adelle Waldman’s debut novel, “The Love Affairs of Nathaniel P.,” scrutinizes the title character and the Brooklyn literary scene he inhabits with a patient, anthropological detachment.

headline.seo: In ‘Love Affairs of Nathaniel P.,’ Women Flummox a Writer
headline.main: Brooklyn, Where Exes May Lurk, Tests an Emotional Fugitive
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn, Where Exes May Lurk, Tests an Emotional Fugitive
